WYSIWYM.model
Class QueryNode

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.model.Node
      WYSIWYM.model.SGNode
          WYSIWYM.model.QueryNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable, TreeComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
QueryValueNode
public class QueryNode
extends SGNode

QueryNode is a node in the QueryGraph. It has a boolean operator, denoting whether it is part of a conjunction, disjunction, or is a denial or optional.

Version:
1.2 08-02-2008
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

Constructs a copy of the given node, and add it with all its edges to the QueryGraph

Parameters:

Returns:
QueryNode, copy of node
Throws:
NameAlreadyBoundException, - very unlikely
NameAlreadyBoundException

setBooleanOperator

public void setBooleanOperator(int op)
Sets the boolean operator. Default value is -1; value can be set to 0 = conjunction (and), 1 = disjunction (or), 2 = negation (not).

Parameters:
op - integer between 0 and 2
See Also:
QueryGraph

getBooleanOperator

public int getBooleanOperator()
Returns the boolean operator. Default value is -1; value can be set to 0 = conjunction (and), 1 = disjunction (or), 2 = negation (not).

Returns:
integer between 0 and 2
See Also:
QueryGraph
